title: A Change in Daily Routine
description: Laura talks about how she changed her daily routine and her future plans.
speaker: Laura
text: A few months ago, my daily routine was very different.
I used to wake up late and rush to work every morning.
Last month, I decided to change my routine.
Now, I wake up early and start my day with a short walk.
I also prepare my tasks the night before.
Next week, I am going to join a gym near my house.
I believe this new routine will help me feel more active and organized.
